sentence: moreover, small community banks continue to experience considerable earnings pressure based on historically low net interest margins, and many report concerns about their prospects for continued growth and profitability.

additionally, in accordance with the economic growth and regulatory paperwork reduction act of 1996 (egrpra), the federal banking agencies have launched a review to identify banking regulations that are outdated, unnecessary, or unduly burdensome.5 the comment period for the egrpra review for the first set of regulations ended early in september 2014, and the agencies plan to publish three additional federal register notices seeking comment over the next year and a half.
